actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to reduce Federal advertising budgets.
short_title: Reduction in Federal Advertising Budgets Act of 2012

summary.text: Reduction in Federal Advertising Budgets Act of 2012 - Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) to issue a directive limiting agency expenditures for advertising in FY2013 to not more than 50% of the amount of such expenditures during FY2012.

titles.title: Reduction in Federal Advertising Budgets Act of 2012
A bill to reduce Federal advertising budgets.
